articles.author: Connor Jones
articles.title: Ivanti discloses fifth vulnerability, doesn't credit researchers who found it - The Register
articles.description: Software company's claim of there being no active exploits also being questioned
articles.content:
In disclosing yet another vulnerability in its Connect Secure, Policy Secure, and ZTA gateways, Ivanti has confused the third-party researchers who discovered it.
Researchers at watchTowr blogged to… [+3847 chars]
